message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its quality but also the potential benefits it could bring to you. I believe it represents an excellent opportunity for both of us. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you've described. Would you be willing to consider this price?
